Element.Name: UBL Version identifier
Element.Description: Requires UBL version 2.2

Element.Name: Express of interest identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that is suitable for identifying or referencing a document.

Element.Name: Call for tender issue date
Element.Description: The date on which transaction is issued.

Element.Name: Call for tender issue time
Element.Description: Time of issue of Transaction.The time zone has to be informed following the BII Guideline on Data Formats.

Element.Name: Reference number
Element.Description: An identifier that is specified by the buyer and used as a reference number for all documents in the procurement process. It is also known as procurement project identifier, procurement reference number or contract folder identifier. Used as a link to the call for tenders.

Element.Name: Economic operator preferred languager
Element.Description: The language the economic operator prefers to use when receiving documents from the contracting body. Use the ISO 639 1 code list

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO)

Element.Name: Contracting body electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the contracting body.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier. Can be the registration number in the professional registry.

Element.Name: Economic operator electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the economic operato

Element.Name: Economic operator registration country code
Element.Description: The registration country code of the economic operator. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address. Usually the street name and number or post office box

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". It is recommended to use the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: TA phone number for the contact point

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Lot identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the lot.
